nodes.text: The Januul camp was a native tribal camp, extensive and mobile, pitched by the Januul, an Alwari overclan of the planet Ansion. Like many other Alwari clans, the Januul nomads could efficiently disassemble their camp, as needed, and move around Ansion.
In 22 BBY, a skirmish with their Borokii overclan rival took place outside this camp.
